meanings.definition: To ride a wave without a surfboard, using only one's body.
meanings.sent1: She bodysurfed the big wave at the beach.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, he bodysurfed in the ocean and had a great time.
meanings.sent3: The dolphin bodysurfed alongside the swimmers, showing off its skills.
meanings.sent4: The wind seemed to bodysurf through the tall grass, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, the colors of the sky looked like they were bodysurfing on the horizon.

meanings.sent1: After the storm, she proudly bodysurfed the huge waves.
meanings.sent2: They bodysurfed all day yesterday and had a blast.
meanings.sent3: The cat bodysurfed on the freshly made bed, leaving paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The music bodysurfed through the room, filling it with rhythm and melody.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the children bodysurfed in the air, bringing joy to all who heard.
